ProjectsArray.Title: Dad Jokes All Day
ProjectsArray.About: This was Project 1 for General Assembly SEI. We were tasked with making an API call using Ajax to a third party API. Once data was recieved we were then tasked with displaying that information. I decided to make two onClick event listeners, one for the setup and the second for the punchline.
